entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm near Lake Erie. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie late in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
